hero.name: Matkarim
hero.description: 6+ years of experience building production-grade web applications with React, Next.js, and TypeScript

about.title: About Me
about.description: Full Stack Developer with 6+ years of experience. Currently working as a Software Engineer at UNICON-SOFT (Tashkent).
about.whoIAmText: I'm a Full Stack Developer with over 6+ years of professional experience. I specialize in large-scale projects and business solutions. I have deep expertise in React, Next.js, TypeScript, Node.js, and PostgreSQL. Additionally, I have experience with PHP and Yii2 framework, and I can develop multi-functional Telegram bots using Node.js. I focus on clean code, high performance, and creating user-friendly interfaces.
about.experience1Description: Developing and maintaining information systems for customs authorities. Building full-stack applications with Node.js, PostgreSQL, React, and modern web technologies.
about.experience2Description: Implementing functionality and logic according to technical specifications and architectural decisions. Writing and optimizing code, analyzing bugs, and conducting code reviews.
about.experience3Description: Developing and maintaining web applications using PHP Yii2 framework and modern frontend technologies. Writing and optimizing code for university systems.
about.experience4Description: Earned a Bachelor's degree with a strong foundation in software development, algorithms, and system design.
